      • mergeInGameMap

        void mergeInGameMap​(SlaveController pov,
                    java.lang.Runnable finalize,
                    java.util.function.Consumer<java.lang.String> broadcaster)
        Parameters:
        pov - the SlaveController linked to the player enacting the effect
        finalize - contains all the instructions to run after the end of the effect. Including also the list of effects still to apply. Will be just called, not in a thread
